General.Name: Shunfeng International Clean Energy Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shunfeng International Clean Energy Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides clean energy and low-carbon energy-saving integrated solutions in Mainland China. The company manufactures and sells solar products, as well as offers related installation services. It is also involved in the solar power generation business; and development and manufacture of hydrogen energy equipment of heavy duty trucks. The company was formerly known as Shunfeng Photovoltaic International Limited and changed its name to Shunfeng International Clean Energy Limited in November 2014. Shunfeng International Clean Energy Limited was incorporated in 2010 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Bank of China Tower, Central, Hong Kong
